english.segment1: Looking back on how my life pulls up and down, I can see the care you took in pulling me out, And with that voice you shook me up enough to see. I need to be sure of the ground on which I am standing.
english.segment2: With weights around your feet you can't run, The race, the father waits.

english.segment4: We're so focused on the sins of our friends, We forgot forgiveness, it's so much easier to. Cast a judgment, we've forgotten where our hope is, You'll find us throwing stones and spitting cusses.

english.segment7: Now I see how much you mean, Now I see how much you mean to me.
